snippet: AN EMBARGO PROPOSED.--It is quite time the Union Safety Committee and Abolitionism should join trains, or as sure as fate, their common occupation will be gone. An embargo is proposed upon. the material of agitation....
lead_paragraph: AN EMBARGO PROPOSED.--It is quite time the Union Safety Committee and Abolitionism should join trains, or as sure as fate, their common occupation will be gone. An embargo is proposed upon. the material of agitation.
